thoughts.text: I will now add a timestamp to the filename of the output file generated by the 'rock_simulation.py' script.
thoughts.reasoning: Adding a timestamp to the filename will make it easier for me to distinguish between different runs of the script, and will help me keep track of the changes I make to the workspace over time.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'execute_shell' command to get the current date and time
- Use the 'write_to_file' command to write the timestamp to a variable
- Use the 'execute_shell' command to rename the output file with the timestamp
